name: Untitled Platformer 2022
description:
Don't play this, probably.

This isn't even a game yet, but if I don't share it immediately, I'll wait too long to share it, so I'm just chucking it out there now and will update it most likely several times.

Feedback wanted and very appreciated! Please let me know how the controls feel, which interactions are most fun, and what needs the most work.
